newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Republicans say they are committed to tax cut.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Republicans say they are committed to tax cut.

text.p: House Majority Leader Dick Armey on Wednesday said Republicans were committed to adopting a tax cut as part of legislation to balance the budget.
"Last month, the president met with the congressional leadership, and all agreed to work together to enact a balanced buget with tax relief," he said in a statement.

"Congressional Republicans fully intend to fulfill the commitment we made to a balanced budget with tax relief," the Texas Republican said in a statement. House Republicans have said the size of the tax cut will depend on how much the country can afford once the budget is developed.
